setmap-to: §7The next map has been set to §f%%map%%
set-debug-to: §7Ye have set yer QA debug state to §f%%state%%
set-fly-to: §7Ye have set yer lobby flight to §f%%state%%
no-permission:
§7
§c⚠ §cYe don't have permission to do this, matey! §7§oIf this be a mistake, please contact an administrator.
§7

scoreboard_show_kit_maps.name: Show kit & map on scoreboard
scoreboard_show_kit_maps.description: Select if ye'd like to show or hide the map and kit on the scoreboard

premium.description: §7Premium be a one-time purchased rank that enhances users' experiences and gives 'em exclusive features and benefits on Plexverse. It can be purchased from our Lobby, arr!

premium_plus.description: §7Premium+ be an enhanced membership tier that offers additional benefits for Premium users. It can be purchased from our Lobby, arr!

creator.description: §7Creator be a rank designated for community members who actively contribute content to our platform. To apply, visit our website, matey!

builder.description: §7Builders be responsible for designing maps for Plexverse. They possess expertise in level design, architecture, and excel in creativity. To apply, visit our forums, arr!

trial_moderator.description: §7Trial Moderators assist the community while learnin' the ropes and duties of a Moderator. Use §e/msg§7 to ask 'em a question, matey!

moderator.description: §7Moderators serve as a bridge between the community and the server's administration while ensurin' a smooth and safe operation for all, arr!

admin.description: §7Admins oversee Plexverse's technical aspects and manage teams to ensure proper server operation, matey!
